content.description: <math alttext="The figure presents a five column table, with one row of data. The data in the table are as follows. x is 5. f of x is 2. f prime of x is negative 1. f double prime of x is 8. f triple prime of x is 18."><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnlines="solid" columnspacing="0.0em" columnwidth="3em 0.05em 3em 3em 3em 4em" frame="solid" framespacing="0.0em 0ex" rowlines="solid" rowspacing="0.05ex" width="auto"><mtr><mtd><mi>x</mi></mtd><mtd><mspace depth="1.0ex" height="2.5ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mtd><mtd><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo><mo>′</mo><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mspace depth="1.0ex" height="2.5ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>18</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: Values of a function <math alttext="f"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and its first three derivatives at <math alttext="x equals 5"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math> are given in the table above. What is the third-degree Taylor polynomial for <math alttext="f"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> about <math alttext="x equals 5"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 minus x, plus 4 times x squared, plus 3 times x cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 minus, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, plus, 4 times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, squared, plus, 3 times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 minus, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, plus, 4 times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, squared, plus, 6 times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 minus, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, plus, 8 times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, squared, plus, 18 times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>18</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 minus, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, plus, 4 times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, squared, plus, 3 times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
